definitions.definition: A supporter of democracy ; an advocate of democratic politics (originally ( historical ) as opposed to the aristocrats in Revolutionary France ).
Someone who rules a representative democracy.
A large light uncovered wagon with two or more seats .

main_definition: A supporter of democracy ; an advocate of democratic politics (originally ( historical ) as opposed to the aristocrats in Revolutionary France ).
secondary_definitions: Someone who rules a representative democracy.
( US , historical ) A large light uncovered wagon with two or more seats .
